Lyric:
[by:工作婊]
[00:01.63]Let's take our time tonight
[00:07.72]Above us all the stars are watchin'
[00:12.62]There's no place I'd rather be in this world
[00:19.38]Your eyes are where I'm lost in
[00:23.12]Underneath the chandelier
[00:27.26]We're dancin' all alone
[00:32.76]There's no reason to hide
[00:35.55]What we're feelin' inside
[00:38.27]Right now
[00:41.92]
[00:42.79]So, baby, let's just turn down the lights
[00:46.95]And close the door
[00:49.69]Oooh I love that dress
[00:51.68]But I won't need it anymore
[00:57.26]No, I won't need it no more
[00:59.93]Let's just kiss 'til we're naked, baby
[01:04.35]
[01:04.87]Versace on the floor
[01:08.77]Oooh take it off for me, for me, for me, for me now, boy
[01:15.31]
[01:18.97]Now I unzip the back to watch it fall
[01:25.21]While you kiss my neck and shoulders
[01:29.69]No, don't be afraid to show it all
[01:35.88]I'll be right here ready to hold you
[01:40.36]Boy, you know you're perfect from
[01:44.55]Your head down to your heels
[01:49.73]Don't be confused by my smile
[01:52.81]'Cause I ain't ever been more for real, for real
[02:00.45]
[02:00.54]So just turn down the lights
[02:04.19]And close the door
[02:06.90]Oooh I love that dress
[02:08.89]But I don't need it anymore
[02:14.49]No, I don't need it no more
[02:17.23]Let's just kiss 'til we're naked, baby
[02:21.34]
[02:22.40]Versace on the floor
[02:26.22]Oooh take it off for me, for me, for me, for me now, boy
[02:33.25]Versace on the floor
[02:35.59]
[02:46.85]It's warmin' up
[02:48.20]Can you feel it?
[02:49.57]It's warmin' up
[02:50.77]Can you feel it?
[02:52.35]It's warmin' up
[02:53.60]Can you feel it, baby?
[02:55.82]Oh, seems like you're ready for more, more, more
[03:01.33]Let's just kiss 'til we're naked
[03:06.10]

[03:12.29]Take it off for me, for me, for me, for me
